title: Taking Data from Zillow.com and putting in excel spreadsheet
snippet: I am looking for someone who can use the zillow.com website and can find the zestimate for property addresses on a website.  There are approximately 1100 addresses that need to be researched.  Not every address will have a zestimate.  This project can be broken down into smaller amounts of addresses and distributed between several people.  Contract price will vary based on amount of data being researched.
